title: Jhin has been top 1~2~3 adc ever since 1 patch after his release.
body:
Meanwhile last time trist wasant trash tier was in 2014, jinx 2015...

I think its time to nerf jhin for good and give some help to those and other, weak adcs.

replies.body: I love that you did 1~2~3 without the 4. I'd personally attribute 90% of any downvotes you may accumulate to you not being a sheep for the number 4 when talking about him.

Jhin is in a really great spot. He has amazing strengths, but clear defined weaknesses, this is coming from a Support main.

His weaknesses are his immobility and lack of durability. He's very fragile. 

**If i would consider a nerf - it would be to slightly reduce the SLOW that occurs when he strikes a target with his ultimate, as it makes juking near impossible. **
Alternatively, remove the Crit chance and AS -> AD scaling that he gets.
Hell no, that would make him entirely useless since he will still have shit attack speed and thus shit DPS to go with it.

> [{quoted}](name=JavelinJoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gNKAtdoK,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-02-11T01:59:48.899+0000)
>
> Hell no, that would make him entirely useless since he will still have shit attack speed and thus shit DPS to go with it.

Yeah it would be terrible if he actually had a weakness i know.

Just like its terrible that jinx has no early game/very weak until late game or that vayne has no aoe and a shit laning phase.
He is immobile, squishy af, and has a set attack speed at base value. How are these not weaknesses?

In my opinion I think Jhin is well balanced and every other AD that is "trash tier" should get buffed.

Edit: I would like to add that the "trash tier" ad's just need some sort of item buff. The only reason why Jhin has stayed strong is because he can build crit or armor pen rather effectively.

Jhin is no where near over powered.

The only time he is actually overpowered is when he gets fed, and even then an equally fed or just good fighter/assassin will be able to shut him down
I think you mean {{champion:202}} "one, two, three, FOUR"
He's not overpowered though. The other ADCs are trash-tier. It's not that he's broken-tier. Nerfing Jhin would be illogical.

Cept jhin isn't all the powerful, he's good for utility now compared to when he was a powerhouse back when.  Lethality may have helped him come back a little but not nearly as strong as he used to be... and lethality is the only reason he has as much power now... outside of that he's picked for his ult and hard cc W.
